import React from "react"; import { ListItem } from "../List"; import { Row, Col } from "../Grid"; import "./style.css"; function Wine({ grape, wineType, price, name, year, origin, tastingNotes, grade, feel }) { return (

{grape}

{wineType}

 {/* */}

 ); } export default Wine;
